parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: The account of the user who owns the extension. Only privileged accounts are supported.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the generated token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: DBNames
parameters.description: The database name. You can call the DescribeDatabases operation to query the database name.

parameters.name: Extensions
parameters.description: The extension that you want to install. If you want to install multiple extensions, separate them with commas (,). If you do not specify the **SourceDatabase** parameter, you must specify this parameter.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SourceDatabase
parameters.description: The source database from which you want to synchronize the extension to the destination database. If you do not specify the **Extensions** parameter, you must specify this parameter.
